July 12, 1958 D Pontypridd Contest (Class B)
Pontypridd Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-b
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Ynys-Angharad Park, Pontypridd, Glamorgan 3rd annual contest promoted by Pontypridd Urban District Council.
Note - an unknown Colliery Band (pencil marking is indistinct) competed, drawn no. 2, 8th place, with 168 points
Aug. 18, 2013, 8:51 a.m. May 6, 2019, 8:37 a.m.
1 Cwmbran Band Cyril Evans
